name: Market
shortDescription: A peer-to-peer marketplace for trading digital assets within your community.
longDescription: The Market module powers a community-driven C2C storefront. Members can list, browse, and trade NFTs and digital assets using on-chain escrow. Supports collection-based browsing, trade management, and configurable shop fees.
keyInfo: Peer-to-peer NFT and digital asset trading
Configurable shop fees and currency support
